**RAID ADVICE**
Same build can be used as a P3 support to remove ground hazards as her sp3 description says
P3 will become P1 if she keeps on using sp3 all over the ground removing all hazards
But BM/ Koaam are dmg dealers.
Examples:
	Bm Jlf/Bnc ECT
	Koaam Df ECT
